data.name: The Wild Eight - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Wild Eight - Supporter Pack includes:


The Wild EIght - Digital Artbook

A beautiful collection of 3D and 2D art from the creators of The Wild EIght, showcased in a Digital format.
Contents:
  • Promo Art - A wide array of promotional material developed for the game.
  • Characters - Portraits and various designs of The Wild Eight's main cast.
  • Props - From the various weapons and items to the evolving states of Player Shelters and Workshops.
  • Locations - The enchanting wintry wilds of Alaska look even better up close! From snowy mountain peaks, to the abaonded lodges and mysterious research facilities.
  • Logos - See how the style of The Wild Eight's iconic logo changed over the course of development. Included are logos for the game's content packs, like Beyond The Door and Shadow Hunter updates!


The Wild Eight - Original Soundtrack
This is the soundtrack to The Wild Eight, including 6 tracks, all encoded as 320kbps WAV.

The soundtrack is composed specifically for the game by Vlad Rakitin (Moire Noire). It is going to be updated in the future.

Track List:

  • 1. Intro, The Plane Crash (01:12)
  • 2. Yearning For Human Nature (04:37)
  • 3. Go Far, Go Wide // Snow Desert (03:54)
  • 4. Sunrise // Sunset (02:19)
  • 5. Lost and Wintered (03:07)
  • 6. Feel It Comin' // Industrial Nightmare (00:53)


Exclusive Hats

Every owner of The Wild Eight Supporter Pack will have access to these items in the base game:

- Deer Hat
- Boar Hat
- Wolf Hat

data.short_description: The Wild EIght - Supporter Pack includes: - Digital Artbook - Original Soundtrack - Exclusive Hats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.9 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX 9 compatible video card with shader model 3.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy The Wild Eight - Supporter Pack
